typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Address not authenticated for this action"

nodes.name: addBounty

delistBounty

params._award: - the number of org tokens to mint to a user for completing the bounty
params._description: - the description text of the bounty
params._imageUrl: - the s3 image url of the bounty
params._infinite: - true if bounty can be awarded unlimited number of times, false otherwise
params._manual: - true if admin approves bounties, false otherwise.
params._quantity: - the number of times a bounty can be claimed. overridden by _infinite
params._title: - the title text of the bounty
params._tweetId: - if the bounty is triggered by retweets, specify id. overridden by _manual.

params._nonce: - the index of the bounty being applied to

params._trigger: - uint code of the bounty trigger type

params._nonce: - the index of the bounty within the contract

pendingBountyRequests(uint256).details: pending request x is found doing _users[x] and _bounties[x]

params._trigger: - trigger type to query (1 = manual, 2 = retweet)

returns._bounties: - array of all bounties being requested by a user
returns._nonce: - the number of pending bounty requests
returns._users: - array of all users with pending requests for bounties

params._trigger: - uint code of the bounty trigger type

addBounty(string,string,string,uint256,b.notice: Add a new bounty to the chain

applyForBounty(uint256).notice: Make a new application for a bounty as a user

approveBountyRequest(uint256,uint256).notice: Approve a bounty request and dispense award to user

delistBounty(uint256).notice: Remove a bounty from active circulation, meaning it is no longer accessible

getBounties().notice: Get summary data on all bounties

pendingBountyRequests(uint256).notice: Return all pending bounty approval requests
